statements: SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM leads;
SELECT last_name, first_name, phone_number FROM leads;
SELECT * FROM leads WHERE company = 'ABC Corp';
SELECT lead_id, first_name, email FROM leads ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM leads;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM leads WHERE company = 'ABC Corp' ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM leads WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT first_name, last_name, phone_number FROM leads WHERE company = 'XYZ Ltd' AND first_name ILIKE 'j%';
SELECT lead_id, email, company FROM leads WHERE first_name = 'Alice' OR last_name = 'Smith';
SELECT * FROM leads WHERE company = '123 Company' ORDER BY first_name DESC, last_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM leads WHERE status = 'interested';
SELECT full_name, email FROM leads WHERE lead_id < 100 ORDER BY full_name DESC;
SELECT lead_id, phone_number FROM leads WHERE status = 'active' LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM activities WHERE activity_type = 'meeting' AND activity_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY activity_date ASC;
SELECT lead_id, activity_date, activity_description FROM activities WHERE activity_description LIKE '%follow-up%' OR activity_description LIKE '%call%' ORDER BY activity_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM leads WHERE status = 'New';
SELECT full_name, email FROM leads ORDER BY full_name ASC;
SELECT lead_id, activity_date, activity_description FROM activities WHERE activity_type = 'Meeting' ORDER BY activity_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM leads WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com%';
SELECT lead_id, full_name, phone_number FROM leads ORDER BY lead_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM potential_leads;
SELECT lead_name, lead_email FROM potential_leads WHERE lead_phone = '+123456789';
SELECT * FROM lead_status ORDER BY status_name DESC;
SELECT lead_name, lead_email, lead_phone FROM potential_leads WHERE lead_email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT activity_id, activity_date, activity_description FROM lead_activity WHERE lead_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT lead_name, lead_email FROM potential_leads ORDER BY lead_name ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM lead_status WHERE status_name = 'Active';
SELECT lead_name, lead_email, lead_phone FROM potential_leads WHERE lead_phone LIKE '+1%';
SELECT activity_date, activity_description FROM lead_activity WHERE activity_date >= '2022-01-01' AND activity_date <= '2022-12-31' ORDER BY activity_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT lead_name, status_name FROM potential_leads JOIN lead_status ON potential_leads.lead_id = lead_status.status_id ORDER BY lead_name ASC, status_name DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM leads;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM leads ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT lead_id, first_name, status FROM leads WHERE status = 'New';
SELECT lead_id, first_name, phone_number FROM leads WHERE phone_number IS NOT NULL;
SELECT lead_id, first_name, last_name, email FROM leads WHERE first_name LIKE 'J%';
SELECT * FROM leads;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM leads WHERE status = 'New';
SELECT lead_id, first_name, last_name, email, phone_number FROM leads WHERE phone_number IS NOT NULL;
SELECT l.first_name, l.last_name, ls.source_name FROM leads l JOIN lead_sources ls ON l.lead_id = ls.source_id;
SELECT l.first_name, l.last_name, i.interaction_date, i.interaction_type, i.notes FROM leads l JOIN interactions i ON l.lead_id = i.lead_id;
SELECT lead_name, lead_email FROM potential_leads;
SELECT lead_phone, lead_source FROM potential_leads WHERE lead_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM lead_details WHERE lead_status = 'Qualified';
SELECT lead_name, lead_email, lead_phone FROM potential_leads ORDER BY lead_name ASC, lead_email DESC;
SELECT lead_id, COUNT(interaction_id) AS total_interactions FROM lead_interaction GROUP BY lead_id;
SELECT lead_id, lead_name, lead_email FROM potential_leads;
SELECT lead_id, lead_name, lead_email, lead_phone FROM potential_leads WHERE lead_id > 100;
SELECT lead_name, lead_email, lead_source FROM potential_leads ORDER BY lead_source DESC;
SELECT * FROM lead_details WHERE lead_status='Qualified' ORDER BY follow_up_date ASC;

SELECT lead_name, lead_email, interaction_date, interaction_type, interaction_notes FROM potential_leads JOIN lead_details ON potential_leads.lead_id = lead_details.lead_id JOIN lead_interaction ON lead_details.detail_id = lead_interaction.detail_id WHERE lead_name LIKE '%John%' ORDER BY interaction_date DESC;
